attributes.action: make an illegal vehicle a murder weapon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: anyoneknows that if a vehicle is driven by an unathourised person or without full cover for that person to drive is for manslaughter or murder attempted or otherwise,it is an illegal weapon of distruction against another human being and will mark anyone with a lifetime of full disclosure they will never drive again,that means any vehicle without the correct cover ie mot,tax ,insurance

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
